ComicInfo.Title: The Rock
ComicInfo.Summary: Macbeth is aided by Lexington and Hudson to safeguard The Stone of Destiny while it's being taken from London to Scotland. Meanwhile Xanatos prepares for his mission from The Illuminati and recruits Coldsteel and Coyote (Now 5.0).
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-12 16:16:25. [CVDB131618] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-18 12:03:04. [Issue ID 394905]
